recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish with a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add chopped onions and minced garlic to the beef, cooking until fragrant.
Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve the sauce over spaghetti with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful Indian curry with tender chicken pieces.
instructions: Season chicken pieces with curry powder and salt.
In a pot, brown the chicken on both sides, then set aside.
Sauté chopped onions until translucent, then add diced tomatoes.
Return chicken to the pot, add coconut milk, and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: A hearty soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and noodles.
instructions: In a large pot, bring chicken broth to a boil.
Add chopped carrots, celery, and onion, and simmer until tender.
Add egg noodles and simmer for 8 minutes.
Stir in cooked chicken and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Hamburger
recipes.description: A classic American burger with melted cheese and all the fixings.
instructions: Form ground beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Grill patties over high heat until desired doneness.
Top patties with cheese and melt.
Serve on toasted buns with lettuce, tomato, and your favorite condiments.

recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish with breaded chicken and tomato sauce.
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Dredge chicken in bread crumbs and fry until golden brown.
Top chicken with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with Parmesan cheese and serve with pasta.

recipes.name: Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with tender chicken and a tangy dressing.
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken until cooked through, then slice into strips.
In a large bowl, toss together lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and onion.
Top with sliced chicken and drizzle with your favorite dressing.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.description: Hearty beef stew with vegetables in a thick broth.
instructions: Cut beef into chunks and brown in a large pot.
Add chopped onions and cook until softened.
Stir in diced carrots and potatoes, then add beef stock.
Simmer until beef is tender and vegetables are cooked.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Stir-fry vegetables in a hot pan with oil, starting with the hardest ones.
Add minced ginger and soy sauce for flavor.
Cook until vegetables are tender but still crisp.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Simple and classic pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Roll out pizza dough to desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with slices of mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Bake in a preheated oven until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic grilled cheese sandwich with melted cheese.
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between the non-buttered sides of the bread slices.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and grill the sandwich until golden brown on both sides and the cheese is melted.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.description: A creamy tomato soup, perfect as a comfort food.
instructions: Sauté chopped onions and garlic until translucent.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften.
Pour in chicken or vegetable stock and bring to a simmer.
Blend the mixture until smooth, return to the pot, and stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
recipes.description: Simple and delicious baked salmon with herbs.
instructions: Preheat the oven and place salmon fillets in a baking dish.
Season with minced garlic, dill, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Bake until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily.

recipes.name: Fish and Chips
recipes.description: Classic British fish and chips with a side of tartar sauce.
instructions: Cut potatoes into chips, fry until golden, and drain.
Make a batter with flour and beer, coat fish fillets, and deep fry until crisp.
Serve fish and chips with tartar sauce and lemon wedges.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: Rich and moist chocolate cake with chocolate frosting.
instructions: Mix flour, cocoa powder, and sugar in a bowl.
Add eggs and melted butter, and blend until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased cake tin and bake until a skewer inserted comes out clean.
Let the cake cool before applying chocolate frosting.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Fresh salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella cheese into 1/4 inch thick slices.
Arrange slices alternately on a plate, overlapping for effect.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the arranged slices.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste and garnish with fresh basil leaves.
